s1-text1: Prost, and Happy Oktoberfest! Having originated in Germany in 1810, the iconic Oktoberfest with its fair grounds, dancing, and, of course, beer, is now celebrated the world over. Not to miss out on the festivities, the BlackShot Mercenaries are having their very own Oktoberfest party this September, and everyone is invited! Join the BlackShot Mercs for a variety of activities, including a Steins vs. Hearts competition, the return of the Berlin Map, community events and more!
s2-text1: Oktoberfest is here and the BlackShot Team wants to know how you celebrate! Join the Mercenary Team whose prizes you want more, either Steins or Gingerbread Hearts, and work together to beat the other team’s score. The event will conclude and prizes will be given out on October 23rd.
s2-sub-title: Each team's score will be determined by kills with specific weapons:
s2-signin-text1: To choose your team, you must log in first:
s2-singin-text2: Not a player? Create an account now
s2-singin-notice: *If this team loses, they only receive this prize
s3-text1: With Oktoberfest underway, the Berlin map will be making a return to BlackShot to mark the occasion. Visit this classic map and pay homage to one of Germany’s most iconic cities!
s4-text1: The first Omega BlackShot ever introduced is back again for the CS76 Goldbox. The HK416 is a German-manufactured Assault Rifle built to compete with the United States-based M4 Carbine family of rifles, and remains one of the top rifles in the world. The HK416 has a short-stroke gas piston for improved automatic fire, and both it and its light counterpart display the distinct BlackShot Omega style.
s4-w1-desc: A legend of the Omega family, the HK416 Omega is a powerhouse in every regard. This assault rifle is a near-perfect killing machine, and is renowned in the Mercenary community.
s4-w2-desc: The original that started it all, the HK416 Omega Lite is a well-rounded assault rifle suited for any combat engagement. This weapon is a little piece of BlackShot history.
s5-text:
Enjoy 200% EXP & 300% BP Boosts on these maps during the Oktoberfest Festivities.

Office Infinity(SD-I)
Broken City II (TFM)
Secret Base (SD)
Reclaim (DOM)
Berlin (TFM)
s6-text: With so much alcohol being consumed, the Polizei force are on site to maintain order! Our GMs will be donning the Polizei outfits and battling Oktoberfest revelers (that’s you!) with awesome prizes on the line!
s7-text: Join the party with the GMs and pick your favorite team in this community competition! Each GM will captain a team and face off against one another in a series of special matches. Join the competition to get to know the GMs and win some great prizes!
